title: Rename app to TickTaskTime and clarify App Market publishing steps

requirements.text: Rename the app to "TickTaskTime" across the frontend branding so the header app name and the browser tab title reflect the new name.

quotes: change the name to TickTaskTime please

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/index.html` `<title>` is updated to use the new name (and no longer shows `TickTask`).
No remaining user-visible occurrences of `TickTask` appear in the UI chrome (header/tab title) after the change.

requirements.text: Update the existing "Publish to the App Market" section in the Publish & Share sheet to provide clearer, step-by-step English instructions for publishing via Caffeine (without attempting to automate submission).
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/features/publishShare/PublishShareSheet.tsx` includes App Market publishing steps that explicitly reference using Caffeineâ€™s UI (e.g., where to go in Caffeine after the app is Live) rather than a generic "visit submission page" instruction.
The note clarifying this applies to Caffeine apps (not Wix) remains present and is still clearly worded in English.
No new integrations, API calls, or external service dependencies are added as part of this change.

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only Shadcn components).
Do not modify files listed as immutable: `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in `backend/main.mo`; do not introduce additional backend services.
nonGoals: Automatically publishing/submitting the app to the App Market from within the app.
Adding third-party authentication or any non-Internet-Identity auth.
Adding a backend database or external storage service.
